DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Lidocaine Infiltration in Suction Assisted Lipectomy
DOC.criteria: Woman I or II of the Classification of the American Society of Anesthesiologists. Completed high school. Between 18 and 40 years old At least suction of entire abdomen and back Body mass index between 20 and 27 Accept written informed consent Associated surgery Hypersensibility to (Cefazolin or Clindamycin, Lidocaine, Ketorolac, Morphine, Remifentanyl, Propofol, Tramadol). Pregnancy Previous surgery to abdominal wall or back, including cesarean. Abdominal wall hernia Previous liposuction Active psychosis
DOC.keyword: Healthy women wanting Suction Assisted Lipectomy
